    • Constructor Detail

      • BoxROI

        public BoxROI()
        Creates an empty Rectangle 3D Region of Interest (ROI) in the image. The coordinate min are set to Integer.MAX_VALUE and the coordinates max are set to Integer.MIN_VALUE, as initialized to compute minima and maxima by going sequentially through values.

      • BoxROI

        public BoxROI(short xmin,
              short ymin,
              short zmin,
              short xmax,
              short ymax,
              short zmax)
        Creates a Rectangle 3D Region of Interest (ROI) in the image. The coordinates bounding boxe's minimal coordinates and edges length (in number of pixels) are given as parameters.
        Parameters:
        xmin - minimal X coordinate of the ROI
        ymin - minimal Y coordinate of the ROI
        zmin - minimal Z coordinate of the ROI
        xmax - maximal X coordinate of the ROI plus one
        ymax - maximal Y coordinate of the ROI plus one
        zmax - maximal Z coordinate of the ROI plus one

    • Method Detail

      • contains

        public boolean contains(VoxelShort voxelInTheBox)
        Update the boundaries of the BoxROI to take into account that a given voxel must be in the box.
        Parameters:
        voxelInTheBox - A voxel that should be tested to know whether it is contained in the box.
        Returns:
        true if the voxel is contained in the BoxROI, and false otherwise.

      • getCenter

        public VoxelDouble getCenter()
        Returns:
        The Geometric center of the BoxROI (iso-barycenter of the voxels contained in the BoxROI)

      • getSize

        public VoxelShort getSize()
        Returns:
        The size of the box in each dimension (in voxel coordinates)

      • updateBox

        public void updateBox(VoxelShort voxelInTheBox)
        Update the boundaries of the BoxROI to take into account that a given voxel must be in the box.
        Parameters:
        voxelInTheBox - A voxel that should be contained in the box.

      • duplicate

        public BoxROI duplicate()
        Returns:
        A full copy of the BoxROI

      • getEnlargedBox

        public BoxROI getEnlargedBox(short xMargin,
                             short yMargin,
                             short zMargin)
        Enlarge a BoxROI by some margin on both sides for each coordinate axis. The BoxROI can be shrunk if margins are negative.
        Parameters:
        xMargin - Width of the margin to add on both sides
        yMargin - Height of the margin to add on both sides
        zMargin - Depth of the margin to add on both sides
        Returns:
        An enlarged (or shrunk if margins are negative) version of the BoxROI.

      • clip

        public void clip(int xMinClip,
                 int yMinClip,
                 int zMinClip,
                 int xMaxClip,
                 int yMaxClip,
                 int zMaxClip)
        Allows to intersect (clip) the Box with a box-like region (ROI), in order to ensure that the resulting box is included in that region.
        Parameters:
        xMinClip - Minimal X coordinate of the ROI to intersect with.
        yMinClip - Minimal Y coordinate of the ROI to intersect with.
        zMinClip - Minimal Z coordinate of the ROI to intersect with.
        xMaxClip - Maximal X coordinate PLUS ONE of the ROI to intersect with.
        yMaxClip - Maximal Y coordinate PLUS ONE of the ROI to intersect with.
        zMaxClip - Maximal Z coordinate PLUS ONE of the ROI to intersect with.

      • getMin

        public short getMin(CoordinateAxis axis)
        Parameters:
        axis - The coordinate axis for which to retrieve the voxel's coordinate value
        Returns:
        The minimal coordinate value for this coordinate.

      • getMax

        public short getMax(CoordinateAxis axis)
        Parameters:
        axis - The coordinate axis for which to retrieve the voxel's coordinate value
        Returns:
        The maximal coordinate value for this coordinate plus one.

      • setMin

        public void setMin(CoordinateAxis axis,
                   short value)
        Allows to set the minimal coordinate value for a given coordinate.
        Parameters:
        axis - The coordinate axis for which to retrieve the voxel's coordinate value
        value - The value to use for the new minimal coordinate.

      • setMax

        public void setMax(CoordinateAxis axis,
                   short value)
        Allows to set the maximal coordinate value, plus one, for a given coordinate.
        Parameters:
        axis - The coordinate axis for which to retrieve the voxel's coordinate value
        value - The value to use for the new maximal coordinate plus one.

      • getAxisSwapped

        public void getAxisSwapped(CoordinateAxis axis1,
                           CoordinateAxis axis2)
        Allows to swap coordinates axis in the voxel's domain by modifying the attributes for minimal and (maximal plus one) coordinate values.
        Parameters:
        axis1 - The first axis to be swapped
        axis2 - The second axis to be swapped

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        See Also:
